verses.name: John 6:61
verses.text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it, he said unto them, Doth this offend you?

verses.name: John 6:62
verses.text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before?

verses.name: John 6:63
verses.text: It is the spirit that quickeneth; the flesh profiteth nothing: the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.

verses.name: John 6:64
verses.text: But there are some of you that believe not. For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not, and who should betray him.
